title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-7.2 - Receipt of supplies and equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-7.2 - Receipt of supplies and equipment

State Regulations
A copy of each receiving and inspection report covering
the receipt of supplies and equipment will be forwarded to the accounting
section. The receiving and inspection report will indicate whether the items
are to be charged to an inventory account or directly to expense. Upon receipt
of a receiving and inspection report, it shall be processed in accordance with
the instructions contained in subdivision (c) of section
1642-2.4. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1642-7.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
